text: A Fight to the Finish is a 1925 American silent drama film directed by B. Reeves Eason and starring William Fairbanks, Phyllis Haver and Tom Ricketts.Bingmann p.17 ==Cast== * William Fairbanks as Jim Davis * Phyllis Haver as Mary Corbett * Tom Ricketts as Cyrus J. Davis * Pat Harmon as Pat O'Brien * William Bolder as Henry McBride * Leon Beaumon as Battling Wilson ==References== ==Bibliography== * Melissa Bingmann. Prep School Cowboys: Ranch Schools in the American West. UNM Press, 2015. ==External links== * Category:1925 films Category:1925 drama films Category:American films Category:American drama films Category:American silent feature films Category:English-language films Category:Columbia Pictures films Category:Films directed by B. Reeves Eason Category:American black-and-white films
title: A Fight to the Finish (1925 film)
